name: Hotel Cortijo Bravo

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We have just returned from a wonderful stay in Cortijo Bravo.
reviews.title: The best hotel so far

description: Hotel Cortijo Bravo combines the elegant and typical decorative style of the classic Andalusian houses of the landed gentry with Malaga's own cosmopolitan and romantic trends of the Nineteenth Century. With the added extra of enjoying all the amenities of the Twenty-First Century. All contained in an enviable location, on the Mediterranean. Being at one with nature, rivers and streams, the sea and its beaches. Spectacular mountain views from the Maroma. White-washed villages bathed by the sun.
